verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> hath said נָבָ֣ל <WH5036> The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> in his heart אֵ֣ין <WH369> There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [There is] no God הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ <WH7843> They are corrupt הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <WH8581> they have done abominable עֲלִילָ֗ה <WH5949> works אֵ֣ין <WH369> is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <WH8259> looked down עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> upon the children אָ֫דָ֥ם <WH120> of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <WH7200> to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> if there מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> were any that did understand דֹּ֝רֵשׁ <WH1875> [and] seek אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> have all סָר֮ <WH5493> They are all gone aside יַחְדָּ֪ו <WH3162> they are [all] together נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <WH444> become filthy אֵ֤ין <WH369> There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good אֵ֝֗ין <WH369> is no גַּם־ <WH1571> even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדְעוּ֮ <WH3045> no knowledge כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> Have all the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> ? who eat up עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> my people אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> not upon the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> and call

שָׁ֤ם ׀ <WH8033> There פָּ֣חֲדוּ <WH6342> fear פָ֑חַד <WH6343> There were they in great כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> for God בְּד֣וֹר <WH1755> [is] in the generation צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> of the righteous
עֲצַת־ <WH6098> the counsel עָנִ֥י <WH6041> of the poor תָבִ֑ישׁוּ <WH954> Ye have shamed כִּ֖י <WH3588> But יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> because the LORD מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4268> [is] his refuge

מִ֥י <WH4310> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <WH6726> [were come] out of Zion יְשׁוּעַ֪ת <WH3444> the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> bringeth back יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> when the LORD שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> of his people יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> shall be glad יִשְׂרָֽאֵל׃ <WH3478> [and] Israel
